name: Commonwealth ex rel. Mobley, Appellant, v. Myers
name_abbreviation: Commonwealth ex rel. Mobley v. Myers

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Mr. Justice Cohen took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Commonwealth ex rel. Mobley, Appellant, v. Myers.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Order affirmed.
Mr. Justice Cohen took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Charles Motley, appellant, in propria persona.
Vincent C. Veldorale and Joseph M. Smith, Assistant District Attorneys, F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Jr., First Assistant District Attorney, and James C. Crumlish, Jr., District Attorney, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth ex rel. Mobley, Appellant, v. Myers.
September 27, 1966 :
Submitted November 12, 1965.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Charles Motley, appellant, in propria persona.
Vincent C. Veldorale and Joseph M. Smith, Assistant District Attorneys, F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Jr., First Assistant District Attorney, and James C. Crumlish, Jr., District Attorney, for appellee.
